resources.string:
1. Select the Service: Choose the service you need from the list below. Each service may have specific requirements or documents, so please check the details carefully.

 2. Choose a Date and Time: Pick a date and time that works for you from the available slots. Make sure to book your appointment in advance to avoid long waiting times.

 3. Upload Required Documents: Some services may require you to upload documents before your appointment. Be sure to have these ready.

 4. Confirm Your Appointment: Once youâ€™ve entered your details, we'll show you a summary of your appointment. Review it and confirm your booking. You will receive a notification with your appointment details.
